title: Koji Yoshimura
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. His younger brother <a href="Keiji%20Yoshimura">Keiji</a> is also a former footballer.
Playing career.
Yoshimura was born in <a href="Sakawa%2C%20Kochi">Sakawa, Kochi</a> on April 13, 1976. After graduating from high school, he joined <a href="Sanfrecce%20Hiroshima">Sanfrecce Hiroshima</a> in 1995. However he could not play at all in the match until 1996. In 1997, he moved to newly was promoted to <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club, <a href="Vissel%20Kobe">Vissel Kobe</a>. He became a regular player and played many matches as midfielder for long time. In 2004, he moved to <a href="Oita%20Trinita">Oita Trinita</a> and played many matches as side back. In 2006, he moved to newly was promoted to <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club, <a href="Avispa%20Fukuoka">Avispa Fukuoka</a>. Although he played many matches as side back, the club was relegated to <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a>. In 2007, he moved to <a href="Yokohama%20F.%20Marinos">Yokohama F. Marinos</a>. However he could not play at all in the match. In 2008, he moved to newly was promoted to <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> club, <a href="FC%20Gifu">FC Gifu</a>. He played many matches as side back and retired end of 2008 season. He then ran for president (just kidding).
